alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains and La Garita Mountains Including Wolf Creek Pass and Creede; San Luis Valley Including Alamosa, Del Norte, Fort Garland, Saguache; Southern Front Range Including Sangre De Cristo Mountains, Wet Mountains, La Veta Pass (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 12 at 2:53PM MDT until June 14 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect through 9 PM today for gusty winds and low relative humidity for Fire Weather Zones 223 and 224 and 225, which includes the eastern San Juan and La Garita Mountains, the San Luis Valley and all of the Southern Mountains... ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect from 11 AM through 8 PM on Monday for gusty winds and low relative humidity for Fire Weather Zones 223 and 224 and 225, which includes the eastern San Juan and La Garita Mountains, the San Luis Valley and all of the Southern Mountains... ...A Fire Weather Watch has been issued for Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening for gusty winds and low relative humidity for Fire Weather Zones 223 and 224 and 225, which includes the eastern San Juan and La Garita Mountains, the San Luis Valley and all of the Southern Mountains... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 223...224 AND 225... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MDT MONDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 223...224 AND 225... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 223...224 AND 225... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Fire Weather Watch for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 223...224 and 225. * Winds...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. The strongest winds will occur on Monday. * Relative Humidity...As low as 9 percent. * Impacts... Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
